text: You should positively anticipate the onset and the offset of your mid-morning resistance exercise session. Think about how hard it will be at the beginning and how great you will feel after. You should also reward yourself for the entire experience, not just the execution of the habit itself. Finally, you should mentally walk through the series of steps required to perform the habit.
